title: Forbidden Love
overview: Forbidden Love is a ZEE5 Original anthology romantic thriller series starring Ali Fazal, Patralekhaa, Aditya Seal, Chandan Roy Sanyal, Raima Sen, and Rannvijay Singh in the lead roles. Each episode explores a dark side of love like infidelity, jealousy, and the feeling of being trapped in a relationship and is directed by an award-winning director such as Pradeep Sarkar, Aniruddha Roy Chowdhury, Priyadarshan, and Mahesh Manjrekar.
